content: the starting chain placing the last double_crochet into the base of the skipped chain that count as the 1st double_crochet of the row turn 62 double_crochet row 2 chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 29 sts turn 98 sts fasten_off and weave in ends attach stick to blanket by slip stitching or sewing using mattress stitch see photos and tutorial below for more information large size row 1 chain 111 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook skipped chs count as 1st double_crochet and all chains across until the last chain 6 double_crochet in last chain
